murder.next_steps: Report immediately to the police emergency helpline 100 or visit the nearest police station.

theft.description: Whoever commits theft shall be punished with imprisonment or fine.
theft.punishment: Up to 3 years of imprisonment or fine, or both.
theft.next_steps: Report to the nearest police station or file an FIR online.

assault.description: Assault or use of criminal force to outrage a woman's modesty.
assault.next_steps: Approach women's helpline (1091) or file a police complaint immediately.

cybercrime.description: Sending offensive messages through communication services.
cybercrime.next_steps: Report to Cyber Crime Cell (www.cybercrime.gov.in) and preserve digital evidence.

domestic violence.ipc_code: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005
domestic violence.description: Covers physical, emotional, sexual, and economic abuse in domestic relationships.
domestic violence.punishment: Protection orders, residence orders, and imprisonment for non-compliance.
domestic violence.next_steps: Call 181 (Women Helpline) or visit the nearest police station.
